Text: "You're now listening to araabMUZIK" spoken in almost all tracks... That's what we get for being plundering pirates, I guess. A clean version would be appreciated.
The comments on the iTunes Store page contain the same complaints, so I assume this is the legitimate album.
That's Just How araabMUZIK Do - That's His 'Audio Tag' Every Song He Makes Has That - Check Out His Beats On CamRon & Vado 'Gunz N Butta' Same Thing
THIS SHIT IS SO FUCKING RAW
Excellent album, but  this sounds like a promo copy...
